title: On-site resident concierge services, Front-loading washer and dryer
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 710 Sq.
Trademark is a new boutique address on Hill Street.
It’s mixing high-design and posh amenities with a hip, walkable location that’s at the intersection of DTLA’s best neighborhoods and destinations.
We're now leasing, so please call to make an appointment and tour Trademark!

Modern kitchens with islands, Wood style flooring, Open-floor plans with full-height windows, NEST thermostats, Stainless-steel appliance suite, Front-loading washer and dryer, Studio, one, two and three-bedroom apartments, Private balconies*, Built-in window blinds, Spacious walk-in closets, Sleek quartz countertops, Posh bathrooms with quartz countertops and porcelain tile

Controlled-access bike storage and repair area, Resort-style outdoor entertainment courtyard, Dog friendly walking area, Rooftop deck featuring views of Downtown LA, Clubhouse with a bar, kitchen and pool table, Resort-style, infinity-edge pool with cabanas and hot tub, State-of-the-art fitness center with cardio and weight room, yoga/pilates studio and fitness?on?demand, Private dining room and catering kitchen, On-site resident concierge services, Valet Parking Available
